name: Is All Fair In Love And War? Part 2 Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions
tags: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days

questions.text: When did Ben stop wearing diapers?
questions.explanation:
Age 5.

	Andie mentioned that Ben's mom told her this piece of information while she and Ben were at his apartment. This was right after Andie showed Ben pictures of what their kids would look like.

questions.text: Did Michelle say couples therapy cost $500?
questions.explanation:
No.

	When Ben suggested seeing a couples therapist, Andie said she would call one. The therapist Andie picked was actually her friend Michelle, who worked at "Composure" magazine. When Ben took out his wallet, Michelle said the session would cost $300.

questions.text: What day did Ben have Knick's tickets for?
questions.explanation:
Day 13.

	Ben showed her the tickets and told her to keep the day free for the basketball game. This happened right after they came back from visiting his parents on Staten Island. The deal that Andie made at the beginning of the movie meant that she needed to lose Ben by day 10 of their relationship. The deal Ben made at the beginning of the movie was that by day 10 he would have Andie in love with him.

questions.text: Ben's mother told Andie he used to bring his girlfriends home.
questions.explanation:
False.

	While on the porch playing a card game, Ben's mother told Andie that the reason none of Ben's girlfriends were on the board for winning the card game was because Andie was the first girl he had ever brought home.

questions.text: What was the name of the diamond Andie wore at the party?
questions.explanation:
Isadora.

	The 84 carat diamond Andie wore was named after Isadora Duncan and matched Andie's yellow dress. Each woman who attended the party got to wear some kind of diamond or diamonds for the ad campaign, "Frost yourself" which Ben and his partners came up with after Andie referred to their dog's diamond collar as frosting.

questions.text: Who found out about the other person's bet first?
questions.explanation:
Andie.

	Andie found out from Thayer and Tony that Ben was trying to get her to fall in love with him in ten days. They broke up on the sidewalk outside the party.

questions.text: While at the party Tony made this remark about Andie: "Tone deaf and drunk. Never a good combination."
questions.explanation:
True.

	He made the comment after hearing Andie butchering Carly Simon's "You're So Vain". Andie was singing the song about Ben.

questions.text: Where was Andie going after she quit "Composure"?
questions.explanation:
Washington D.C.

	After breaking up with Ben, Andie quit her job and got an interview in Washington D.C. so she could write serious articles.

questions.text: Who told Ben where to find Andie?
questions.explanation:
Michelle.

	Ben ran into Jeannie first and then Michelle told him that Andie was leaving for Washington D.C. Ben took their love fern, told Michelle she owed him $300 dollars, and went to find Andie.

questions.text: To stop the cab, what did Andie ask the cabdriver for, so she could throw up?
options: She didn't ask the driver for anything
questions.explanation:
Ashtray.

	Andie told the cabdriver to pull over, and when he wouldn't she asked him for an ashtray to throw up in. The cabdriver pulled the cab over. Andie and Ben made up on the bridge and he took her back on his motorcycle, while the cabdriver took her bags back to her house.
